summary: Email correspondence from August 16, 2019, regarding the Office of the Inspector General's request to interview staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center about the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein the previous weekend. The document shows coordination for voluntary interviews of medical staff.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the inmate (register number 76318-054) involved in an incident at the Metropolitan Correctional Center the previous weekend, which is the subject of the OIG interview request.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.role: Special Agent, Office of the Inspector General
persons.context: Special Agent from the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) who is coordinating voluntary interviews with medical staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding the incident involving Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: M. is forwarding a request from the Special Agent (OIG) to interview staff at the correctional center about the Epstein incident.
The Special Agent from the OIG is seeking to interview staff regarding an incident involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC
events.description: An incident occurred at the Metropolitan Correctional Center involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein the weekend prior to August 16, 2019, prompting an OIG investigation and interview requests.

events.title: OIG interview request coordination
events.description: On August 16, 2019, the Office of the Inspector General, via a Special Agent, coordinates through attorney M. to conduct voluntary interviews with medical staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center regarding the Epstein incident.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
Office of the Inspector General, 1 Battery Park Plaza, 29th floor, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: The document is dated August 16, 2019, and references an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein that occurred the previous weekend at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The Office of the Inspector General (OIG) is seeking to interview staff, specifically medical staff, at the MCC regarding the Epstein incident.
Jeffrey Epstein's inmate register number is listed as 76318-054.
The correspondence shows coordination for voluntary interviews, indicating an investigative process following the incident.
